notification.name: ConnectionCompleted
notification.details: The Kerberos SSO extension has run its connection process.

notification.name: ADPasswordChanged
notification.details: The user has changed the Active Directory password with the extension

notification.name: LocalPasswordSynced
notification.details: The user has brought the Active Directory and local passwords in sync.

notification.name: InternalNetworkAvailable
notification.details: The user has connected to a network where the configured Active Directory domain is available.

notification.name: InternalNetworkNotAvailable
notification.details: The user has connected to a network where the configured Active Directory domain is not available.

notification.name: gotNewCredential
notification.details: The user has acquired a new Kerberos TGT.

notification.name: passwordChangedWithPasswordSync
notification.details: The user has changed the Active Directory password, and the local password has been updated to match the new Active Directory password.
